Claim: "A man visits a friend in the hospital."
Implication: "A man in a hospital receives a visiting friend."
Referring expressions: A man, friend, hospital  A man, hospital, visiting friend
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsVisiting(a,c) and IsInHospital(b))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsInHospital(a) and IsVisiting(a,d))))
